https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vBuChvRmsag5ZH1IH3Vgf87Wvo4.jpg The film is a tragedy based on a courtesan 'Anjuman', who born from a rich noble father and a courtesan mother. After her father's death she and her mother was abandoned by her paternal family. Her mother works as a courtesan to bring her up and wishes oneday her daughter will join the same business like her. Anjuman
